Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: My guess is that when you package and launch your application with Gradle the dependencies are not available in the classpath. The Gradle docs are probably the best help: https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/application_plugin.html

Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: As fr as I can tell, running client applications in working fine. I suspect this is a Gradle usage error. Please reopen if you have any more information to support an SDK issue.
